mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SEQ_NO DESC) AS RNUM ,TITLE ,MEMO FROM TB_BO_BOARD_NOTICE WHERE BOARD_CHANNEL = 1 AND STATUS = 1 ) TBL WHERE RNUM = 1
SELECT USR_ID ,PSWD ,USR_NM ,USR_TYPE ,AUTH_NO ,TEL_NO ,EMAIL ,STATUS ,REG_DT ,UPD_DT ,STATUS ,WORKER ,WORKER_IP FROM TB_BO_USR_ACCT WHERE USR_ID = #{USR_ID} AND PSWD = #{PSWD} AND USR_TYPE = '2'

SELECT UA.USR_ID ,UA.PSWD ,UA.USR_NM ,UA.USR_TYPE ,UA.AUTH_NO ,UA.TEL_NO ,UA.EMAIL ,UA.STATUS ,UA.REG_DT ,UA.UPD_DT ,UA.STATUS ,UA.WORKER ,UA.WORKER_IP ,IFNULL(UA.FAIL_CNT, '0') AS FAIL_CNT FROM TB_BO_USR_ACCT UA LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BO_USR_ACCT_MER UM ON UA.USR_ID = UM.USR_ID WHERE UA.USR_ID = #{USR_ID} AND UA.USR_TYPE = '2'

SELECT CONCAT(COALESCE(OLD_PW1, '-'),',',COALESCE(OLD_PW2, '-'),',',COALESCE(OLD_PW3, '-'),',',COALESCE(OLD_PW4, '-'),',',COALESCE(OLD_PW5, '-')) AS OLD_PW FROM TB_BO_USR_ACCT WHERE USR_ID = #{USR_ID} AND USR_TYPE = '2'
